import React from "react"; import { useParams, Link, Outlet, useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; function Sucess() { const params = useParams(); const user = params.movie; const location = useLocation(); const cost = location.state.totalcost; const count = location.state.counts; const theater = location.state.theatre; const time = location.state.time; const date = location.state.date; const name = location.state.name; var num = cost / count; return ( <>
Booking details:
Name of the user {name}
Movie Name {user}
Date {date}
No. of tickets {count}
Cost of each ticket {num}
Total Cost {cost}
Theater {theater}
Show time: {time}
Booking Status Success
); } export default Sucess;
